name: Spaceman Adventures
description:
Explore the planets of this galaxy and conquer the different exotic worlds along with their tough challenges. Try and solve the many puzzles of the universe.

NOTICE: This game is a work-in-progress and more levels will be added in the coming updates.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys or WASD to move
  • Press the DOWN arrow key or S to fall quickly.
  • T to return to the title screen (while playing)
  • R to restart the level
  • P to pause

The controls are also included in the game.

Ver. 1.7.1

This game was made in the Godot game engine.

Thanks to Deep-Fold's planet art generator for the red planet art.

All assets (art excluding red planet art, sound effects, level layout and design, etc.) and code (excluding engine code) were made by me, JWhiz Games.

This game was a great learning experience as my first time making a scrolling platformer using a game engine. Enjoy!
